item.description:
Do you enjoy tennis? This RSVP is to show your interest and to find a playing partner that is your level. Feel free to contact each other to play. When you RSVP - indicate your level of play (beginner, intermediate, or your NTRP rating). See link for your NTRP rating.

http://www.usta.com/Play-Tennis/USTA-League/Information/About_NTRP/


We will also meetup on this date to play tennis. It will be a good chance to meet other tennis enthusiasts and maybe find a playing partner also.

All levels welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: We will try be at 2 courts side by side. A tele # will be provided to those that RSVP so you can call or text if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Tennis...part 2
